analysis.description:

Reentrancy in NullSettlementState.updateMaxNullNonceFromCommunityVote (/unique_chucks/31/0x3afb87453e80b2ee98a89359611f75691ac049fc.sol#2391-2402):
	External calls:

Servable.isRegisteredActiveService (/unique_chucks/31/0x3afb87453e80b2ee98a89359611f75691ac049fc.sol#412-418) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- isRegisteredService(service) && block.timestamp >= registeredServicesMap[service].activationTimestamp (/unique_chucks/31/0x3afb87453e80b2ee98a89359611f75691ac049fc.sol#417)

CommunityVote.maxDriipNonce should be constant (/unique_chucks/31/0x3afb87453e80b2ee98a89359611f75691ac049fc.sol#490)
CommunityVote.maxNullNonce should be constant (/unique_chucks/31/0x3afb87453e80b2ee98a89359611f75691ac049fc.sol#491)
